header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: personal learning networks, studentsâ€™ higher education studies and summer jobs/part-time work, developing learning materials, and location rebels.
header.activity: A couple brainstorming ideas for a small business in the education sector.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, anecdote telling

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
